column4: how can i apply bold fonts just to the gnome-panel or other menu-bars?
you mean you want to set the font in the window title of a *particular* window?
no, just for example gnome-panel or other menus .. i remember i need to change something in a .gtkrc file
but you have to edit the gtkrc of your current theme
are you talking about ~/.gtkrc or about a file located somewhere else?
the file in your theme directory, for example /home/user/.themes/bla/gtk-2.0/gtkrc
then you need to add a few lines, should i send them to you via pastebin?
my ~/.themes/ contains only . and ..   Yes, config lines much appreciated.  If < 30 lines, just /query ic56 and paste them to me via IRC.
no its just 5 lines or something like that
awk is a better tool than sed for getting words out of a line.  But for what you're doing, pgrep and pkill are the right thing.
